results.title: F.B.I. Found 48 Empty Folders That Had Contained Classified Documents at Trump’s Home

results.title: Four takeaways from Biden’s speech in Philadelphia.
results.abstract: The president tacitly acknowledged that his predecessor still looms over the politics of the moment.
